title: Power-On Glitch Reset-to-Mid Scale
summary: Oscilloscope capture showing AVDD ramp and corresponding VOUT transient during power-on reset-to-mid-scale behavior.

structured_data.description: Two traces are shown: VOUT at 2 V/div and AVDD at 2 V/div, with time base 20 ms/div; labels indicate DAC unloaded at zero scale before transition.

key_values.condition: DAC unloaded, DAC at zero scale
